name: Another Clone
description:
Short puzzle about collaborating with yourself.

Special thanks to all the playtesters, including pinchazumos, qwaffles, Oolimry, Ethan "EPGAstudios" Clark, Notan, Menderbug, Muftwin, & MhmdSubhi!

If you enjoyed this you might enjoy my other puzzle games, such as Tres Undos. Don't miss any of my future stuff by following me on twitter, mastodon, cohost and/or right here on itch.io!
